scenario_text.value: Hey, Takuma.
What is it, Agumon?
Do you regret coming back here?

Nope, not at all...
Why do you ask, all of a sudden?
Really? Really and truly?
(What’s with him, all of a sudden?)

(It’s not a question I can easily answer.
Still, what would Agumon say?)

(Maybe I should give him some encouragement
here?)
(What should I say?)
Really and truly!
It’s hard to say.
Trust me, all right?!
Really and truly!

Of course! I came back to protect everyone of
my own free will.

...Okay! If that’s how you feel, then
I believe you!
It’s hard to say.
It’s hard to say...

I’m not happy to be back under these
circumstances, but I don’t regret anything.

I couldn’t just forget about everyone.
You either, Agumon.
Takuma...

So trust me! You and me, we’ll figure
something out for sure!
Yeah! I’ll do my darndest, Takuma!
Trust me, all right?!

Whaddaya mean? You understand what I’m
saying, don’t you?

It’s just that, this world turned into such a
state while we were gone...

Just trust me, okay? I don’t regret anything,
and I’ll make sure you don’t, either!
Gotcha! I’ll do my best!

(Agumon seems a bit uneasy. Considering how
things are going, I can’t blame him.)

(...I have to do anything I can.
Anything at all!)
I’ll do my darndest, Takuma!
